page.title: 14CASSOP COUNTY J.M & I SCHOOL
page.content: Our School is very small. It has four classrooms and one resources room, where the computer is kept. Also in that room is the Library. There are five teachers: Mr Plant, Mrs Woods, Mrs Beaumont, Mrs Hancox,Mrs.Wills & Mr.McManners the headteacher.We have a hall where we sing and do P.E we have lots of bats and balls.We get our dinner at 12 o'clock.The dinner nannies watch us in the yard.When it is quarter to four we all go home.In our school we do Maths,Stories,Poems, Drama,Science,P.E. Swimming,Project Work,Art and Craft. Swimming is on Tuesday at Kelloe. Every Christmas we have a concert and in the Summer we have Sports Day and outings. Our school has been trying to help the Ethiopian people who are starving and we have raised quite a lot of money.
